website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you need a scientific calculator at an affordable price and don't mind that it comes with a few potentially annoying quirks.
pros: Boasts a streamlined build that feels comfortable in the hand, and doesn't add a lot of bulk to bags or book packs
Perfect for algebraic and statistical equations
Falls on the lower end of the price scale
cons: Buttons have a bit of a flimsy feel
Some owners gripe about the distracting glossy finish

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a calculator for Chemistry class, and this one has worked great. It is simple to use, I like the green color, and it has a cover to protect, which is nice. There is an on and an off switch so make sure you turn it off I guess. Also, the top layer of the calculator is this shiny plastic material that leaves lots of smudges. That's the only thing I don't like. Think of like your smart phone screen. That's what it looks like. So that's my only complaint is the smudges around the keys, which is kind of gross. Hence the 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier T. Guillaume

customer_reviews.title: This is a cheap calculator that works well for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1) Pleasant design 2) Functions like sin, log, etc work the old fashion way, enter the number, then the function key and you get the result (no need to hit "=") 3) Display is relatively big with good contrast 4) Hard plastic keys Cons: 1) The display window is too small compared to the display itself so there is frequently an annoying shadow projected 2) There is no engineering notation, the key is mislabeled "F-E" but it switches between floating point and scientific notation 3) Complex math mode works only for the four basic operations (+-x/) 4) Too glossy finish Bottom line, this is a good buy if you are looking for a simple but practical scientific calculator.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I have a very old version of this. Had it for about 35 years. It has served me well. Time for an updated version. Nice update.
customer_reviews.author: Ken N

customer_reviews.title: But also something easy enough to use for an eight year old
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this calculator for my daughter when she was going back to school. We wanted something robust enough to stand up to the wear and tear in her bookbag and at school. But also something easy enough to use for an eight year old. This calculator is perfect. The price is really not an issue considering the requirements needed in school these days. I would definitely recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Does conversions to different numbering systems
customer_reviews.text: I bought this calculator because I was taking a Programmable Logic class in college and needed to convert numbers from decimal to binary, hexadecimal and octal. instead of spending hours learning the conversion formulas it took me 10 minutes to figure out how to learn to do it on the calculator. Saved me a lot of time and ultimately my grade too. would recommend anyone who is going into electronics/programming. will save you loads of time.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Will help with my math class. Fast shipping, great quality!

customer_reviews.title: Scientific calculator.
customer_reviews.text: Everything I need for math class. Great shipping and great product for the price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erika l. King

customer_reviews.title: Great, Inexpensive Calculator, Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: No issues at all. Cheap, decent calculator that does everything my 6th grade son needs it to
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I mean, what can you say? It’s a calculator. Lol. It’s good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price!! No problems, and has auto shut off after some time.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: it works just fine. I would have personally bought something like a ...
customer_reviews.text: For it's intent, it works just fine. I would have personally bought something like a TI-85 (or whatever the modern day equivalent is...I am showing my age), but my sons needed these specifically for class.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have used this calculator for years. It works amazing and I have never had any problems using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You know... It's my 13 year old's calculator and is more then adequate for his needs.
customer_reviews.text: School required this calculator for my son who is 13. It does the job and is quite stylish (this is important to a teenager). I think it's the green trim. He likes it and it works well for him in school and at home. Inexpensive and sturdy. If I am not mistaking it runs on solar and a battery back up. It's a no brainer if you need a school calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Opinionator

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works brilliantly. And will even convert from decimal to hex!
customer_reviews.author: Julius M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect engineering pocket calculator
customer_reviews.text: Perfect engineering pocket calculator. Does all functions necessary for an engineering curriculum and has not failed me yet. The buttons are a little hard to press and bulky if your not into that kind of thing. Otherwise, nice and solid case and fits well in your pockets. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: hppycmpng

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of using this calculator. Great for calculating rafter cuts, lumber needs, and balancing a check book!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ory

customer_reviews.title: Useful and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love this calculator! I bought it for simple functions and was surprised to find that it has statistics stuff that even was useful in my Intermediate Statistics class. I love the color (lime green is my favorite!), the calculator is simple, very stylish, super functional, and I haven't even learned everything about it yet. It's super flat, fits even in your jean pocket, has a nice protective cover that doesn't scratch... I love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Katya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent calculator
customer_reviews.text: I like my new scientific calculator. It has a good size and is so cute color. I ordered and the next day, I had the calculator at home. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator, has great functions and handy shortcuts once ...
customer_reviews.text: Great calculator, has great functions and handy shortcuts once you know how to use it. Definitely brought me through chemistry this semester
customer_reviews.author: Tajae

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for a great tool.
customer_reviews.text: A great calculator. I used it in my Statistics class and was glad to have it. The beauty of these calculators is they are easily resold when you no longer need them.
customer_reviews.author: CreepyAlan Rides

customer_reviews.title: Reliable scientific calculator
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a basic scientific calculator and I have used this one almost daily for a few years now. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: None Better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a similar one which I bought in Brazil in 1990 and finally became unusable a few months ago. I have used other Sharp calculators through the years and all have given excellent service along with simplicity and ease of use. I know that does not say much about the calculator in question but I have no doubt that it will maintain Sharp's record of quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bradberry

customer_reviews.title: Calculator for cheap!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to believe that you can get such powerful calculator for this price! It is truly amazing that 25 years ago you had to pay big bucks for one like this.
customer_reviews.author: rar49

customer_reviews.title: Sharp El501x Scientific Calculator
customer_reviews.text: Oour daughter uses this for school and has found it helpful, and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item plus 5 additional ones for the back to school packs for the sschool supply drive in our community.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a great purchase. Also, Sharp brand is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: NJK

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this calculator to study for my ACT test. It is just like any other scientific calculator except that the Pi button is a 2nd function. I found trying to use the Pi button quite irritating.
customer_reviews.author: T. Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good buy is very nice to have around.
customer_reviews.text: This calculator does everything I need for my math classes in college and was at a great price. It got through with A's and was easy and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Dryden

customer_reviews.title: college
customer_reviews.text: It works great at as good as the ones in the mall; and the it was a great price i would order it again
customer_reviews.author: Rose Dewitt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, working well so far! No scratches/battery issues after a couple of days of use.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: And there isn't an answer button like on most calculators
customer_reviews.text: Kind of frustrating that I have to press buttons in counterintuitive sequences. I have to write the angle number and then press the trig function button I want. And there isn't an answer button like on most calculators. I though I had a calculator just like this, but this one is just slightly worse. But it's really cheap, so I'll just get used to it. Still frustrating though.
customer_reviews.author: Dolan Clan of the Duck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This calculator is everything I expected it to be and is very user-friendly and easy to operate. It performs every function I could ask and was a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Sharp EL-501XBGR Scientific Calculator Review
customer_reviews.text: 6 out of 19 calculators did not work. This is a C- (70% ) rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work when I recieved it. But I did get a quick refund. :)
customer_reviews.author: Claudie Izai

customer_reviews.title: Not like texas instrument
customer_reviews.text: Used to texas instruments. I don't like that it deletes my previous number typed in. So if calculating a plethora of numbers you can mess up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Oksana Kaleeva

customer_reviews.title: Works like...well....a calculator.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for $1.99. For that price I can't complain unless it starts attacking my hand....which it does not. Works just as expected. Actually a pretty good calculator. *Disclaimer: For the 2 or 3 of you out there who actually read this review, calculators are not known to attack your hand. This was a weak stab at a joke to try and make the review a bit humorous, but there are always a few out there who take things a bit too literal. That is all.
customer_reviews.author: MEZ

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize it was not solar. I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it was not solar. I had to get them for my orphanage in Haiti for my older boys and the batteries are hard to find there. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, just before the school starting, my children loved them, I will update my review after they use it in school for final openion
customer_reviews.author: kloudia

customer_reviews.title: Great....
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for school and home. Easy to use and good quality. Has all the bells you will need.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

product_meta.title: Sharp EL-501XBGR Scientific Calculator
product_meta.description:
Color:Green

SHARP ELECTRONICS EL-501XBGR SCIENTIFIC CALCULATOR
SHARP ELECTRONICS' COMMITMENT TO INNOVATION
Sharp Electronics strives to help you create a balance between work and personal time. Our products enhance life at work, at home, and everywhere in between. Sharp is dedicated to improving lives through the use of advanced technology and a commitment to innovation, quality, value and design.

SUPERIOR FUNCTIONALITY
The EL501XBGR is a fully-functional, high quality scientific calculator that performs over 130 scientific and math functions. This conveniently sized calculator fits perfectly on your desk at home or at work, and it is lightweight so you can take it with you wherever you go. Also, it has a large, easy to read display and a hardcover that protects it from scratching and damage. 

PERFECT FOR STUDENTS
Advanced technology and engineering gives you the pin-point accuracy you expect from Sharp Electronics. This calculator is ideal for students who are studying general math, pre-algebra, algebra, and trigonometry.

FEATURES
 * 10-digit, 1-line LCD display
 * Functions - 131 functions and 1 memory
 * Protective Hardcover - Hard cover protects from scratches.
 * Gloss black case with green accents

SPECIAL FUNCTIONS
 * N-base Calculation(HEX,DEC,BIN,OCT)
 * Complex Number Calculation
 * ½ Variable Statistics
